section.title: Labor Variance by BOO Item
section.para: To view labor variances by Bill of Operations Item, select the "Labor Variance by BOO Item" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Labor Variance by Bill of Operations Item

section.para: When viewing labor variances by Bill of Operations Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose labor variances by Bill of Operations Item you want to view.
Select desired Bill of Operations Item listed on the parent Item's Bill of Operations.
Select to display labor variances by Bill of Operations Item for all Sites.
Specify Site whose labor variances by Bill of Operations Item you want to display.
Labor variances by Bill of Operations Item generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Labor variances by Bill of Operations Item generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists labor variances by Bill of Operations Item, using the specified parameters.
